messages.message: Hey hey!  Not planning on opening north, so would appreciate no Churchill opening
messages.input: Message from RUSSIA:'Hey hey!  Not planning on opening north, so would appreciate no Churchill opening'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F EDI - NWG, F LON - NTH, A LVP - EDI. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should trust the message. Russia's confirmation of not planning on opening north and requesting no Churchill opening aligns with their previous communication, indicating consistency and reliability in their statements.

messages.message: It took me a moment to look up what the Churchill opening is, and, I can guarantee you that won't happen. I hate opening LVP-EDI, to be honest. Sacrificing the ability to protect London goes against my every instinct.
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'It took me a moment to look up what the Churchill opening is, and, I can guarantee you that won't happen. I hate opening LVP-EDI, to be honest. Sacrificing the ability to protect London goes against my every instinct.'.

messages.message: As the great teacher DQ once said, "Always open to Channel"
messages.input: Message from RUSSIA:'As the great teacher DQ once said, "Always open to Channel"'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F EDI - NWG, F LON - NTH, A LVP - EDI. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should trust the message. Russia referencing DQ's advice about the Channel opening aligns with their previous discussion about opening north and indicates a level of sincerity and consistency in their communication.

messages.message: *sigh*  Chris Martin would be so disappointed in your avoidance of the English Channel

messages.message: As much as I love DQ, he isn't always right about everything.
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'As much as I love DQ, he isn't always right about everything.'.

messages.message: Fair enough. I was going to send the video in chat, but damn is it hard to Google anything by someone who shares a name with anyone even remotely famous.

messages.message: Ooh, post-coffee now.  So, you've opened north.  I'm focusing south.  I really don't want to have to spend a lot of time and effort covering my northern dots. So what can we do to keep tensions low up there?

So what can we do to keep tensions low up there?'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A YOR - NWY VIA, F NTH C A YOR - NWY, F NWG - BAR. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should trust the message. Russia's acknowledgement of your northern opening and expression of a desire to keep tensions low align with their previous communication, indicating a cooperative approach and genuine attempt at maintaining a harmonious relationship in the northern regions.

messages.message: Well I'm planning to build an army, and I'm not planning to put it in Norway. Do you want support into Sweden?
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'Well I'm planning to build an army, and I'm not planning to put it in Norway. Do you want support into Sweden?'.

messages.message: GDI,I hate this app. I never saw your comment, so I assumed you were being silent cause you were going to shuffle barents and Norway, so that tap was defensive. I see you're focused elsewhere, so it won't be repeated.

messages.message: No problem at all! I would certainly appreciate that.
